basic.Peptide Name: Human beta-defensin 4 (hBD-4, BD-4; Beta-defensin 104; Human, mammals, animals)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus carnosus TM300 (MIC=4.5 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli BL21 (MIC>100 µg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC=4.1 µg/ml).Yeast:Saccharomyces cerevisiae ATCC9763 (MIC>100 µg/ml).
